mapper.select: /* oracle.biz_dashBoard.grid_modalAccountList */ SELECT 'sample1' as column1, 'data1' as column2, 'a' as column3, '1' as column4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'sample2' as column1, 'data2' as column2, 'b' as column3, '2' as column4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'sample3' as column1, 'data3' as column2, 'c' as column3, '3' as column4 FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'sample4' as column1, 'data4' as column2, 'd' as column3, '4' as column4 FROM DUAL
